title: Looking for Giants
description: "The impossible happens all the time. You just have to know where to look."A storm descends upon the island village of Palpillon, and everyone has run off to the mountains for shelter. Everyone that is, except for twelve-year-old Bast and his friend, Adora. As they make their way back to safety, a hand reaches down from the sky and whisks Adora up into the clouds, never to be seen again.Thus begins Bast's journey where he discovers the Cabinet Man's incredible secret, a desert that exists above the clouds, and an island called "No-thing" is more than what it appears to be.Most importantly, this is a journey to find his friend.But first, he has to look for the impossible: he has to look for giants.
author: Dominic Ross
